text: Victor Sutton (3 December 1935 - 29 July 1999) was a British professional racing cyclist. He rode in the 1960 Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1935 births Category:1999 deaths Category:British male cyclists Category:People from Thorne, South Yorkshire Category:Sportspeople from Doncaster Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Victor Sutton
